prompt: Create a recently viewed products page with a clean white background and a transparent app bar with the title 'Recently Viewed' in bold black text, aligned to the right. The page should feature a vertically scrollable list of product cards with rounded corners and a subtle teal shadow. Each card should have a white background, containing a square product image placeholder (light grey with a shopping bag icon) on the right, and product details on the left. The product details should include the product name in bold black text, a short description in grey text, the current price in bold teal, and the original price crossed out in red. Place an 'Add to Cart' button with a teal background and white text at the bottom left of each card. Use generous padding for a spacious layout.
